about_the_game:
In this visual novel 7 girls crashland into an uninhabited planet, now it’s up to you to take them to safety...  Or not! The only thing sure is there is going to be sex involved. Multiple routes good and bad so you can take the story in your own direction aside from forming the relationships you want. 

The good choice is always easy to see, but can the girls do it? Manage the group’s willpower, some choices aren’t easy to make for the girls and there is where the willpower points enter! Depending on each girl’s traits some of the options will cost willpower and most of those options will lead to better results, but on the other side the easy way will get some willpower, it’s up to you to manage it! 

Of course this is a life or death situation, so expect bad endings but don’t worry you won’t get a surprise bad ending because you made a bad choice 3 hours ago. Bad endings are easy to spot and most of the time will go against the girl’s self preservation instinct so you won’t be locked into a bad ending, on the other side if you want to see what happens you’ll know when it’s time to save. 

Not everything is bad, choose who will end up with who. There are many combinations between the girls wanting Luna, the catgirl to end up with Esmeralda, the teacher? We got that, but what if you want Luna to end up with Denisse, the four armed girl and Esmeralda with Gigi, the slime girl? Of course you can! There are a lot of combinations to enjoy during a playthrough.

content_descriptors.notes: Every character has sex scenes, all characters are 19 and above.

detailed_description:
In this visual novel 7 girls crashland into an uninhabited planet, now it’s up to you to take them to safety...  Or not! The only thing sure is there is going to be sex involved. Multiple routes good and bad so you can take the story in your own direction aside from forming the relationships you want. 

The good choice is always easy to see, but can the girls do it? Manage the group’s willpower, some choices aren’t easy to make for the girls and there is where the willpower points enter! Depending on each girl’s traits some of the options will cost willpower and most of those options will lead to better results, but on the other side the easy way will get some willpower, it’s up to you to manage it! 

Of course this is a life or death situation, so expect bad endings but don’t worry you won’t get a surprise bad ending because you made a bad choice 3 hours ago. Bad endings are easy to spot and most of the time will go against the girl’s self preservation instinct so you won’t be locked into a bad ending, on the other side if you want to see what happens you’ll know when it’s time to save. 

Not everything is bad, choose who will end up with who. There are many combinations between the girls wanting Luna, the catgirl to end up with Esmeralda, the teacher? We got that, but what if you want Luna to end up with Denisse, the four armed girl and Esmeralda with Gigi, the slime girl? Of course you can! linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 compatible

name: Lust Survivor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon®
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU capable of showing images
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: In this visual novel 7 girls crashland into an uninhabited planet, now it’s up to you to take them to safety...  Or not! The only thing sure is there is going to be a lot of sex involved.
